content.title: Visual Information Matters for ASR Error Correction
Evaluation of large-scale synthetic data for Grammar Error Correction
Towards Automated Evaluation of Explanations in Graph Neural Networks
content.abstract: Explaining Graph Neural Networks predictions to end users of AI applications in easily understandable terms remains an unsolved problem. In particular, we do not have well developed methods for automatically evaluating explanations, in ways that are closer to how users consume those explanations. Based on recent application trends and our own experiences in real world problems, we propose automatic evaluation approaches for GNN Explanations.
